definition: ability/talent/sb of a certain type/a capable individual/only/only then/just now

sentences.english: People who support EITHER party are just pawns in the game.
sentences.chinese: 支持哪一邊的人都只是你奴才在遊戲外面的卒子而已。

sentences.english: Your highness, I am always in the Central Palace serving the talent ladies.
sentences.chinese: 殿下，奴才一直在中宮伺候才人們。

sentences.english: Then, with all my subjects gone, I would no longer be the king of flunkeys.
sentences.chinese: 我將沒有一個臣民，我將不再是奴才們的君主。

sentences.english: A lapdog needs to get his master's blessing.
sentences.chinese: 狗奴才需要得到它主子的祝福。

sentences.english: This is psychology of a kind of flunky .
He will forever be a slavery who knows not how to earn and save.
sentences.chinese: 不懂掙錢和積財，只能永遠當奴才。

sentences.english: Will Magic Find work with Minions and Hirelings?
sentences.chinese: 魔力將與奴才和傭工發現工作嗎？

sentences.english: A bunch of flunkies ran out and chased Moron away.
sentences.chinese: 一羣奴才都出來，將傻子趕走。

sentences.english: Don’t fall into the trap of becoming a mindless minion.
sentences.chinese: 不要掉進陷阱，成了沒腦子的奴才。

sentences.english: The Famen Temple, Chia Kuei is a trusted lackey of Liu Chin, a Ming Dynasty eunuch.
sentences.chinese: 賈桂是京劇《法門寺》裏明朝宦官劉瑾的親信奴才。

sentences.english: The slave and his master political back to people, and Go back homeland for Marx and Lenin's Germany!
sentences.chinese: 奴才及其主子還不還政與民，滾回德國馬列祖宗家去。

sentences.english: The ah slavery is from be don't go don't even lift is that has not sum Niang guidance of.
sentences.chinese: 哎奴才出身就是不行啊更別提是個沒額娘教導的。

sentences.english: In Chiang Kai-shek's areas, I found that education was used as a tool to forge servile followers for Chiang Kai-shek.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲，蔣管區的教育是爲範介石訓練奴才的工具。

definition: Master (term used by servant)/Your Majesty/operator (of machine)
the emperor/Your majesty the emperor/His imperial majesty
(literary) I, your servant (self-appellation of a lower-rank female)/(archaic) male and female slaves/subjects (of a ruler)
state official or subject in dynastic China/I, your servant (used in addressing the sovereign)/Kangxi radical 131
